column1: Smoque BBQ////Now that you understand how the place runs let me tell you the food is nothing like fast food. The who meal was amazing and I suggest you get one thing and everyone else gets something else so you can sample a little of this and a little of that. Be aware though that they run out of stuff fast due to the fact that they make bbq the way it should be made
column2: over hours or days of cooking. So when they are out
